title.value: Idiolect: A Reconfigurable Voice Coding Assistant
title.justification: The title of the paper is stated clearly at the beginning.
title.quote: Idiolect: A Reconfigurable Voice Coding Assistant

extractions.description: The paper presents Idiolect, an IDE plugin for voice coding. It introduces a novel approach that allows users to define custom commands on-the-fly without rebuilding or restarting the application. The paper also provides an experience report on the tool's development, use cases, and lessons learned.

type.justification: The paper provides an experience report and evaluates the tool through experiments.
type.quote: We conducted a preliminary experiment to evaluate recognition performance on synthetic speech.

name.justification: The research focuses on developing a voice coding assistant, which primarily involves speech recognition and language processing.
name.quote: Idiolect integrates with Vosk, a state-of-the-art deep speech system with real-time models for various languages, which provides an open source Java API.

name.justification: A significant part of the paper discusses automatic speech recognition (ASR) and its integration into the IDE plugin.
name.quote: Today, automatic speech recognition (ASR), the translation of an audio waveform containing speech to text, is essentially a solved problem â€“ one of the many pretrained ASR models would work well enough for our purposes.

name.justification: The paper explicitly mentions using VoskAPI for speech recognition tasks.
name.quote: Idiolect integrates with Vosk, a state-of-the-art deep speech system with realtime models for various languages, which provides an open source Java API.

is_contributed.justification: VoskAPI is not introduced by this paper but is integrated and used within the tool the paper describes.
is_contributed.quote: Idiolect integrates with Vosk, a state-of-the-art deep speech system with realtime models for various languages, which provides an open source Java API.

is_executed.justification: The paper mentions integrating and using VoskAPI within the Idiolect tool for speech recognition.
is_executed.quote: Idiolect integrates with Vosk, a state-of-the-art deep speech system with realtime models for various languages, which provides an open source Java API.

is_compared.justification: VoskAPI is not compared numerically to other models in the paper.
is_compared.quote: Using VoskAPI 0.3.45 and Idiolect 1.3.3, we synthesized 100 utterances from the predefined command list...

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper does not reference another paper specifically about VoskAPI.

name.justification: The paper evaluates the performance of the Idiolect system using this model.
name.quote: We report the average word error rate (WER) of three ASR models trained on US English speakers: vosk-model-en-us-0.22 (0.63), vosk-model-en-us-0.22-lgraph (0.66) and vosk-model-small-en-us-0.15 (0.73).

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper does not reference another paper specifically about this dataset.

name.justification: The paper evaluates the performance of the Idiolect system using this model.
name.quote: We report the average word error rate (WER) of three ASR models trained on US English speakers: vosk-model-en-us-0.22 (0.63), vosk-model-en-us-0.22-lgraph (0.66) and vosk-model-small-en-us-0.15 (0.73).

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper does not reference another paper specifically about this dataset.

name.justification: The paper discusses integrating the Idiolect plugin with the IntelliJ Platform.
name.quote: In addition to end-user configurability, Idiolect is designed to be extensible by other IntelliJ Platform plugins, which can define additional commands, recognition handlers and custom actions.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper does not reference another paper specifically about the IntelliJ Platform.

name.justification: The paper explicitly states the use of VoskAPI for speech recognition tasks.
name.quote: Idiolect integrates with Vosk, a state-of-the-art deep speech system with realtime models for various languages, which provides an open source Java API.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper does not reference another paper specifically about VoskAPI.
